mapper.select: select CHILD_TBL_NO, NEW_TBL_CODE, CHILD_TBL_NUM, CHILD_TBL_TYPE, CHILD_TBL_RMARK, CHILD_TBL_USE_STATUS from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE= #{NEW_TBL_CODE} and CHILD_TBL_USE_STATUS = 'true' order by CHILD_TBL_NUM*1
select CHILD_TBL_RMARK from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE= #{NEW_TBL_CODE} limit 1
select * from DTL_TBL where NEW_TBL_CODE= #{NEW_TBL_CODE} and CHILD_TBL_NUM > 0 order by CHILD_TBL_NUM*1
select CAST(IFNULL(max(CHILD_TBL_NO+0)+1,1) as char) CHILD_TBL_NO, (select CAST(IFNULL(max(CHILD_TBL_NUM+0)+1,1) as char) FROM DTL_TBL WHERE NEW_TBL_CODE= #{NEW_TBL_CODE}) CHILD_TBL_NUM from DTL_TBL
